Typography

29 Apr 2014

This is a test to see how well my site conforms to normal typography standards. For example, the next paragraph should not contain more than 2-3 alphabets, preferably around 2 and 1/2 alphabets.

abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz

These words should be easy to read, and not breaking in random places.

A while I was shown this website, which is a great typography guide.

How we read:

Medium article about Typography: "Getting Turnt for Typography"

101 Free Fonts (NOTE: Not all are for commercial use)
